title: Mission event quest bugs
body: So, I've been doing the daily missions for the past two weeks now, and I've gotten myself to 270 order tokens. I was really excited to finally get my Dawnbringer icon/border, but I've stopped receiving quests. Riot, was this intentional? I stopped receiving quests four days ago, and (coincidentally) I reached 270 Order tokens four days ago, (Aka one quest away from getting the 280 reward). Was this intentional? Or is my account just bugged? Please send help!      {{champion:133}}  ~By the Quinn main, who wants back the old kit.~

replies.body: Hi, i'm here because i think i got a similar bug, so since the Worlds quest started i just got access to the first week of quests, if i'm not mistaken we are on the second week of the worlds and i still got my quest log with 1 quest from week 1 witch requires another set of quests from the next weeks. So if you can look into the problem i would appreciate it. Thanks for your time

Yea that'd be pretty messed up if you weren't getting any missions over the last few days. I've got your account pulled up to make sure this is right, but it does actually look like you were getting and completing all the available missions. You were able to complete the 2 daily missions each day on the 26th-29th. You haven't gotten missions the past two days because the [**event officially ended on the 29th**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017).

Oh, okay. I was confused, because it said the versus tokens were available until 7/24/17, and I thought that's when the event ended :/ Well, guess who's going to blow all of his tokens on key fragments? {{champion:133}} ~The Quinn Main~
